name: Cat Hunter Demon Slayer
description:
CAT HUNTER DEMON SLAYER

In this game you play as Mr.Miauw and protect Catopia from the evil hell hounds. Enter BARK, the realm of dogs, to slay catopia's foes. The war is never-ending.

The concept of the game was to have an infinitely looping action-rpg. Due to time constraints it turned out to become a looping arena shooter, with limited adittional features.

We developed almost everything from scratch. The only asset not our own is the Hellhound sprite which is created by Luis Zuno (@ansimuz). The piece is under a CC-BY-3.0 Licence http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

This being our first unity project, we are really happy with what we were able to deliver in this jam. The music, the art, and the code.
For more of our projects check out our website: katelyst.com or our itch page: https://katelyst.itch.io/

HOW TO PLAY:

W - MOVE UP
A - MOVE LEFT
S - MOVE DOWN
D - MOVE RIGHT

SPACE - DASH

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - SHOOT
